scripts.watch: clear; echo '* NPM UPDATE *'; npm update; echo '* CLEAN * HTML * ENV * FAVICON * ASSETS * CSS * WATCHIFY *'; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s watch:all
scripts.watch:noUp: clear; echo '* CLEAN * HTML * ENV * FAVICON * ASSETS * CSS * WATCHIFY *'; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s watch:all
scripts.build: clear; echo '* NPM UPDATE *'; echo '* * * *  BUILD  * * * *'; NODE_ENV=production npm run -s build:all; mv ./build/index-2.0.0.html ./build/index.html
scripts.build:dev: clear; echo '* NPM UPDATE *'; echo '* * * *  BUILD  * * * *'; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s build:all
scripts.lint: echo begin linting... && eslint src/*.js src/services/* src/utils/* src/modules/* && echo linting complete.
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.link: npm link augur.js && npm link augur-ui-react-components
scripts.publish-ipfs: ipfs name publish `ipfs add -rq build | tail -1`
scripts.build:all: npm run -s clean && (npm run -s build:css & npm run -s build:assets & npm run -s build:env & npm run -s build:favicon & npm run -s build:js) && npm run -s build:html && npm run -s build:airbitz && npm run -s build:finish
scripts.build:css: for file in $npm_package_config_less_entry_files; do lessc $file | cleancss --s0 | npm run -s partial:replaceBuildFolderString > ./build/$npm_package_version/$(basename $file | sed -e 's~less~css~') ; done && echo ---------CSS------------`date +%r`
scripts.build:js: npm run -s build:js:browserify | npm run -s partial:replaceBuildFolderString | npm run -s partial:uglify -- --mangle > ./build/$npm_package_version/build.js && echo ---------JS-------------`date +%r`
scripts.build:favicon: cp ./src/favicon.ico ./build/ && cat ./src/manifest.json | npm run -s partial:replaceBuildFolderString | npm run -s build:inline_sources > ./build/$npm_package_version/manifest.json && echo ---------FAVICON--------`date +%r`
scripts.build:html: cat ./src/index.html | npm run -s partial:replaceBuildFolderString | npm run -s build:inline_sources > $(npm run -s partial:index_filename) && echo ---------HTML-----------`date +%r`
scripts.watch:all: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build:airbitz && (npm run -s watch:css & npm run -s watch:env & npm run -s watch:favicon & npm run -s watch:assets & npm run -s watch:js & npm run -s watch:html)
scripts.watch:js: watchify $npm_package_config_js_entry_file --extension=.js --extension=.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] -t [envify purge] --debug -o 'exorcist ./build/$npm_package_version/build.js.map | npm run -s partial:replaceBuildFolderString > ./build/$npm_package_version/build.js && echo ---------WATCHIFY--------`date +%r`'
scripts.clean: rimraf ./build/* && mkdir -p ./build/$npm_package_version && mkdir -p ./build/$npm_package_version && touch $(npm run -s partial:index_filename) && echo ---------CLEAN----------`date +%r`
